bibl.title: Landowners and Tenants in Roman Egypt. The Social Relations of Agriculture in the Oxyrhynchite Nome. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. The Oxyrhynchite Nome. - II. The Land Category System and its Development. - III. The Tenure of Public Land. - IV. The Landowners and their Properties. - V. The Inheritance of Land. - VI. The Sale and Mortgage of Land. - VII. Private Agricultural Tenancy and its Context. - Conclusion. - Appendices (1. Tables 1-19; - 2. Oxyrhynchite Land Leases). - Bibliography. - Glossary. - Indices.
bibl.seg: ROWLANDSON Jane, Landowners and Tenants in Roman Egypt. The Social Relations of Agriculture in the Oxyrhynchite Nome. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1996, 8°, xiv-384 pp., tabl., graphiques, 3 cartes. ISBN 0-19-814735-X. £45.

Introduction. - I. The Oxyrhynchite Nome. - II. The Land Category System and its Development. - III. The Tenure of Public Land. - IV. The Landowners and their Properties. - V. The Inheritance of Land. - VI. The Sale and Mortgage of Land. - VII. Private Agricultural Tenancy and its Context. - Conclusion. - Appendices (1. Tables 1-19; - 2. Oxyrhynchite Land Leases). - Bibliography. - Glossary. - Indices.

C.R. par Richard Alston, CR N.S., 47 (1997) pp. 364-365. - Roger S. Bagnall, Gnomon 71 (1999) pp. 373-376. - Daniele Foraboschi, Athenaeum 87 (1999) pp. 599-602. - Dennis P. Kehoe, JRA 10 (1997) pp. 561-566. - Michael Sharp, JESHO 42 (1999) pp. 116-118. - Bruce E. Nielsen, IJCT 6 (1999-2000) No. 1, pp. 105-107.
